42 class ARROW_EXPORT Decimal128 {
43  public:
45  constexpr Decimal128(int64_t high, uint64_t low) noexcept
46  : high_bits_(high), low_bits_(low) {}
47 
49  constexpr Decimal128() noexcept : Decimal128(0, 0) {}
50 
52  template <typename T,
53  typename = typename std::enable_if<std::is_integral<T>::value, T>::type>
54  constexpr Decimal128(T value) noexcept
55  : Decimal128(static_cast<int64_t>(value) >= 0 ? 0 : -1,
56  static_cast<uint64_t>(value)) {}
57

109

129  static Status FromString(const std::string& s, Decimal128* out,
130  int32_t* precision = NULLPTR, int32_t* scale = NULLPTR);
131 
135  static Status FromBigEndian(const uint8_t* data, int32_t length, Decimal128* out);
136 
138  Status Rescale(int32_t original_scale, int32_t new_scale, Decimal128* out) const;
139 
141  template <typename T, typename = internal::EnableIfIsOneOf<T, int32_t, int64_t>>
142  Status ToInteger(T* out) const {
143  constexpr auto min_value = std::numeric_limits<T>::min();
144  constexpr auto max_value = std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
145  const auto& self = *this;
146  if (self < min_value || self > max_value) {
147  std::stringstream buf;
148  buf << "Invalid cast from Decimal128 to " << sizeof(T) << " byte integer";
149  return Status::Invalid(buf.str());
150  }
151  *out = static_cast<T>(low_bits_);
152  return Status::OK();
153  }
154 
155  private:
156  int64_t high_bits_;
157  uint64_t low_bits_;
158 };

163 ARROW_EXPORT bool operator<=(const Decimal128& left, const Decimal128& right);
